mapper.insert: insert into USER_LOTTO_RECORD (draw_num, user_seq, lotto_num1, lotto_num2, lotto_num3, lotto_num4 , lotto_num5, lotto_num6, lotto_rank, crt_dt, crt_ip) values(#{drawNum},#{userSeq},#{lottoNum1},#{lottoNum2},#{lottoNum3},#{lottoNum4},#{lottoNum5}, #{lottoNum6},#{lottoRank},#{crtDt},#{crtIp})
mapper.select: SELECT match_counts.DRAW_NUM, match_counts.RECORD_SEQ, match_counts.USER_SEQ, match_counts.LOTTO_NUM1, match_counts.LOTTO_NUM2, match_counts.LOTTO_NUM3, match_counts.LOTTO_NUM4, match_counts.LOTTO_NUM5, match_counts.LOTTO_NUM6, match_counts.CRT_DT, match_counts.CRT_IP, match_counts.match_count, CASE WHEN match_counts.match_count = 6 THEN 1 WHEN match_counts.match_count = 5 AND match_counts.BONUS_MATCH = 1 THEN 2 WHEN match_counts.match_count = 5 THEN 3 WHEN match_counts.match_count = 4 THEN 4 WHEN match_counts.match_count = 3 THEN 5 ELSE 10 END AS LOTTO_RANK FROM (SELECT ULR.RECORD_SEQ, ULR.DRAW_NUM, ULR.USER_SEQ, ULR.LOTTO_NUM1, ULR.LOTTO_NUM2, ULR.LOTTO_NUM3, ULR.LOTTO_NUM4, ULR.LOTTO_NUM5, ULR.LOTTO_NUM6, ULR.CRT_DT, ULR.CRT_IP, -- 당첨 번호와 매칭된 개수를 계산 ( (CASE WHEN ULR.LOTTO_NUM1 IN (WN.WINNING_NUM1, WN.WINNING_NUM2, WN.WINNING_NUM3, WN.WINNING_NUM4, WN.WINNING_NUM5, WN.WINNING_NUM6) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN ULR.LOTTO_NUM2 IN (WN.WINNING_NUM1, WN.WINNING_NUM2, WN.WINNING_NUM3, WN.WINNING_NUM4, WN.WINNING_NUM5, WN.WINNING_NUM6) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN ULR.LOTTO_NUM3 IN (WN.WINNING_NUM1, WN.WINNING_NUM2, WN.WINNING_NUM3, WN.WINNING_NUM4, WN.WINNING_NUM5, WN.WINNING_NUM6) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN ULR.LOTTO_NUM4 IN (WN.WINNING_NUM1, WN.WINNING_NUM2, WN.WINNING_NUM3, WN.WINNING_NUM4, WN.WINNING_NUM5, WN.WINNING_NUM6) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN ULR.LOTTO_NUM5 IN (WN.WINNING_NUM1, WN.WINNING_NUM2, WN.WINNING_NUM3, WN.WINNING_NUM4, WN.WINNING_NUM5, WN.WINNING_NUM6) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN ULR.LOTTO_NUM6 IN (WN.WINNING_NUM1, WN.WINNING_NUM2, WN.WINNING_NUM3, WN.WINNING_NUM4, WN.WINNING_NUM5, WN.WINNING_NUM6) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) ) AS match_count, -- 보너스 번호와 매칭되는지 여부 확인 (CASE WHEN WN.BONUS_NUM IN (ULR.LOTTO_NUM1, ULR.LOTTO_NUM2, ULR.LOTTO_NUM3, ULR.LOTTO_NUM4, ULR.LOTTO_NUM5, ULR.LOTTO_NUM6) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS BONUS_MATCH FROM USER_LOTTO_RECORD ULR JOIN WINNING_NUM WN ON ULR.DRAW_NUM = WN.DRAW_NUM WHERE ULR.DRAW_NUM = #{drawNum} ) AS match_counts ORDER BY match_counts.DRAW_NUM DESC, match_counts.match_count DESC, match_counts.CRT_DT;
